org.apache.zookeeper.server

类 SessionTrackerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.zookeeper.server.ZooKeeperThread
        • org.apache.zookeeper.server.ZooKeeperCriticalThread
          • org.apache.zookeeper.server.SessionTrackerImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Runnable, SessionTracker
    直接已知子类:
    LocalSessionTracker

    public class SessionTrackerImpl
extends ZooKeeperCriticalThread
implements SessionTracker
    This is a full featured SessionTracker. It tracks session in grouped by tick interval. It always rounds up the tick interval to provide a sort of grace period. Sessions are thus expired in batches made up of sessions that expire in a given interval.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initializeNextSessionId

        public static long initializeNextSessionId(long id)
        Generates an initial sessionId.

        High order 1 byte is serverId, next 5 bytes are from timestamp, and low order 2 bytes are 0s. Use ">>> 8", not ">> 8" to make sure that the high order 1 byte is entirely up to the server Id.

        See also http://jira.apache.org/jira/browse/ZOOKEEPER-1622

        参数:
        id - server Id
        返回:
        the session Id

      • checkSession

        public void checkSession(long sessionId,
                         Object owner)
                  throws KeeperException.SessionExpiredException,
                         KeeperException.SessionMovedException,
                         KeeperException.UnknownSessionException
        从接口复制的说明: SessionTracker
        Checks whether the SessionTracker is aware of this session, the session is still active, and the owner matches. If the owner wasn't previously set, this sets the owner of the session. UnknownSessionException should never been thrown to the client. It is only used internally to deal with possible local session from other machine
        指定者:
        checkSession 在接口中 SessionTracker
        抛出:
        KeeperException.SessionExpiredException
        KeeperException.SessionMovedException
        KeeperException.UnknownSessionException
